Main.title: Welcome to Sarah’s Portfolio
Main.subtitle: I’m a Computer Science Specialist student at the University of Toronto. I’m striving to become a creative developer and designer.

About.title: About Me
About.passions: I'm always trying new things and I think that's what makes me hold onto a lot of passions and hobbies. Currently, my recent favourites include travelling to new places, baking new recipes, and painting using my new watercolour set. But of course, I have things I've consistently enjoyed! I've been playing sports, the piano, and a variety of board games since elementary school.
